Member Function Documentation

StartUp::Cause StartUp::Data::GetMainCause (   )  const
 

Returns:
The main cause for booting the device.

BOOLEAN StartUp::Data::IsCause (  Cause  cause  )  const [inline]
 

Using that method it is possible to check for any startup cause, also if multiple causes are set by the system. For example it is possible that both IsCause(ProductionTestOn) and IsCause(NormalOn) are returning TRUE. To ask for the main cause use GetMainCause.
